Reviews.Content: hotel villa value money charming fourstar hotel central location totally renovated paid 108 euros night single including breakfast colleagues conference attending stayed threestar hotels recommended organisers paid accommodation decrepit dont fourstar hotel rome costs 150 euros standard rate hotel villa connected oneminute walk policlinico hospital station line subway metro stops roma termini stops colosseum prime tourist location cant walk front door throw change fontana di trevi hotel fontana recommend central bathrooms renovated standard breakfast rooftop terrace served helpful staff unlimited internet access computer hotel lobby convenient metro buy oneday card 4 euros threeday card 11 euros card 16 euros careful hotel rome called hotel morgana appears reviews totally decrepit villa pronounced villa political history attached home antonio lot buildings rome home political leaders nice stay definitely stay tel

Reviews.Title: “Beware of front desk staff and overcharging for phone calls.”
Reviews.Author: roverino
Reviews.Content: wireless internet wired pay 4 euroshour internet anyway computer lobby iron hotel beleive arguing 15 min allowed iron 2 shirts downstairs conference lastly mean front desk lady trying 28 euros 3 minute phone call placed parking 15 eurosnight receipt am pretty pocketed money beware

Reviews.Title: “We love this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: traveldizzy
Reviews.Content: 2nd stay happy 2007 villa 4star beautiful hotel tucked safe neighbourhood yards policlinico metro station straight termini absolutely love hotel staff friendly corteous welcoming thanks alessandra stay time breakfast rooftop nice view choice continental breakfast helps fill especially visiting sites day 2 nice restaurants la la mimosa walking distance worth visiting hotel happy book reservations prefer staying hussle bussle especially night sleep thank hotel villa definitely recommended
